text:
Harold Mabern, Jr. (March 20, 1936 – September 19, 2019) was an American jazz pianist and composer. He worked in the hard bop, post-bop, and soul jazz fields. He was called by "The Penguin Guide to Jazz Recordings" as "one of the great post-bop pianists". He was born in Memphis, Tennessee.
Mabern died on September 19, 2019 in New York City at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: The Penguin Guide to Jazz Recordings
